statements: SELECT * FROM replication_disaster_recovery;
SELECT id, source_server, destination_server FROM replication_disaster_recovery;
SELECT * FROM replication_disaster_recovery WHERE replication_status = 'active';
SELECT id, source_server, destination_server, replication_status FROM replication_disaster_recovery WHERE replication_method = 'master-slave';
SELECT id, destination_server, replication_method FROM replication_disaster_recovery WHERE source_server = 'prod_01';
SELECT * FROM replication_disaster_recovery WHERE replication_status = 'active';
SELECT source_server, destination_server FROM replication_disaster_recovery WHERE replication_method = 'Continuous';
SELECT id, replication_status FROM replication_disaster_recovery WHERE destination_server = 'server2';
SELECT * FROM replication_disaster_recovery WHERE replication_status = 'inactive' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT source_server, replication_status FROM replication_disaster_recovery WHERE id BETWEEN 3 AND 5;
SELECT * FROM replication_data
SELECT id, data FROM replication_data ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT * FROM backup_data WHERE backup_date <= '2022-06-30'
SELECT backup_name FROM backup_data WHERE id = 2
SELECT id, backup_name FROM backup_data ORDER BY backup_date DESC
SELECT * FROM replication_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT data, id FROM replication_data WHERE data LIKE '%example%';
SELECT * FROM backup_data WHERE backup_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT backup_name FROM backup_data WHERE id = 5 ORDER BY backup_date DESC;
SELECT id, backup_name, backup_date FROM backup_data WHERE backup_name LIKE '%backup%' ORDER BY backup_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM replication_config;
SELECT recovery_method, recovery_status FROM disaster_recovery_status;
SELECT replication_id, replication_frequency FROM replication_config WHERE replication_frequency > 5;
SELECT recovery_method, last_checked FROM disaster_recovery_status ORDER BY last_checked DESC;
SELECT backup_id, backup_status, backup_timestamp FROM data_backup_logs WHERE backup_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM replication_config WHERE replication_frequency > 10 ORDER BY replication_id DESC;
SELECT replication_id, replication_method, replication_frequency FROM replication_config WHERE replication_method = 'manual' AND replication_frequency <= 5;
SELECT recovery_id, recovery_method, recovery_status FROM disaster_recovery_status WHERE recovery_status = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM data_backup_logs WHERE backup_status = FALSE ORDER BY backup_timestamp;
SELECT backup_id, backup_method, backup_timestamp FROM data_backup_logs WHERE backup_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM disaster_recovery;
SELECT id, location FROM disaster_recovery ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT id, location, replication_method FROM disaster_recovery WHERE replication_method = 'synchronous';
SELECT * FROM data_backup WHERE retention_period > 30;
SELECT id, storage_location, retention_period FROM data_backup WHERE encryption_key = 'AES256';
SELECT * FROM disaster_recovery WHERE replication_method = 'Asynchronous';
SELECT location, replication_method FROM disaster_recovery ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT storage_location, retention_period FROM data_backup WHERE retention_period > 30 ORDER BY retention_period DESC;
SELECT log_id, timestamp, message FROM replication_logs WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-12-31 23:59:59';
SELECT description, severity FROM security_risks WHERE severity >= 5 AND status = 'Open' ORDER BY severity ASC;
SELECT * FROM disaster_recovery;
SELECT id, location FROM disaster_recovery ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT * FROM data_backup WHERE retention_period > 30;
SELECT id, backup_location, backup_schedule FROM data_backup WHERE backup_schedule LIKE 'Daily%';
SELECT * FROM security_risks WHERE risk_level > 5 ORDER BY risk_level DESC, risk_name ASC;
SELECT id, location, replication_method FROM disaster_recovery;
SELECT * FROM data_backup WHERE retention_period > 30 ORDER BY backup_schedule DESC;
SELECT risk_name, mitigation_strategy FROM security_risks WHERE risk_level >= 3;
SELECT * FROM replication_logs WHERE operation_type = 'DELETE' OR operation_type = 'UPDATE' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT backup_id, success FROM backup_logs WHERE success = true ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
